title: Understanding Data Origin
text: Understanding where data comes from and who is responsible can help manage growth and mitigate risks. Why would this be crucial for data inventory?

title: Analyzing Data Growth
text: As a company expands, its data also grows. Consider how understanding this relationship can help optimize storage and compliance efforts.

title: Sensitive Data Considerations
text: Consider how the growth of sensitive data compares to overall data growth. This can highlight areas that may require more stringent security measures.

title: Evaluating All Aspects
text: Combine your understanding of data source responsibility, company growth, and sensitive data management to form a comprehensive view of data inventory.
choices: Are you able to reverse engineer the data sources and understand which teams are responsible for the growth in data size and risk
As the company grows, how does the growth in the customer base and revenue correspond to the growth in data
How fast is sensitive data growing relative to data overall
